ValidationRule.description: For fixed fee projects, the bill rate has to be zero.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Billing_Type__c,"Time and Materials"), ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Project_Type__c, "Customer Project"), OR( pse__Requested_Bill_Rate__c=0, ISBLANK(pse__Requested_Bill_Rate__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Time and Materials projects, the Bill Rate must not be equal to zero.
